meanings.definition: The process by which a substance is chemically bonded to a surface.

meanings.sent2: Scientists study chemisorptions to understand how substances interact with surfaces.

meanings.sent4: The chemisorptions of ideas onto his mind sparked a creative explosion.
meanings.sent5: The chemisorptions of paint on the canvas created a vibrant masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The adsorption of molecules onto a surface through chemical bonding.

meanings.sent2: Chemisorptions play a crucial role in many chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The chemisorptions of spices onto the food made it taste extraordinary.
